item.title: Recall for Linux
item.description:
ğŸ”¥ Recall for Linux Are you forced to work with Linux. This amazing tool will bring back all those great Windows Recall features that you have been missing: ğŸŒ² Stores all you sensitive data in an convenient, easily accessible database â²ï¸ 24/7 screencaptures of everything you do ğŸ¥³ Image to text conversion with OCR ğŸ˜‡ Index and store everything your friends tell you over chat apps or e-mail; if it's on your screen we've got you covered. Installation Unfortunately Linux lacks to ability for us to automatically, silently install and enable this on your computer without your consent.

item.title: The last European train that travels by sea
item.description:
The last European train that travels by sea2 days agoShareSaveLottie LimbShareSaveAlamyItaly's sleeper from Milan to Sicily ends with a rare rail-ferry crossing that's threatened by a new mega bridge. 7bn) suspension bridge over the strait â€“ one of the world's most ambitious engineering projects. The Strait of Messina service began in 1899 and was once one of several places in Europe where passenger trains were loaded onto ferries, including between Dover and Dunkirk.

Read more
